name: image_convert
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pragmavantapi.
Tool description: Practical API for streamlined business and cloud applications.
API description: Convert image to different type and resize to smaller size.

accept.description: The content type to accept in the response (default is 'image/png').

format.description: The format to convert the image to (default is 'jpeg').

source.description: The URL of the source image to be converted.

height.description: The desired height of the converted image (default is 300 pixels).

width.description: The desired width of the converted image (default is 300 pixels).
